languages.text: "А что, уже планируешь присвоить его себе?" {n}Верхняя губа Каллигоса подергивается в угрожающей полуулыбке.{/n} "Династия Винтерскейл — это не только я один. С делами протектората управятся наследники и слуги, лелеющие жизнь, полную убогих игрищ в политику. Эта тоскливая участь не для меня".

traits.locale_text: "А что, уже планируешь присвоить его себе?" {n}Верхняя губа Каллигоса подергивается в угрожающей полуулыбке, обнажая острые клыки.{/n} "Династия Винтерскейл — это не только я один. С делами протектората управятся наследники и слуги, лелеющие жизнь, полную убогих игрищ в политику. Эта тоскливая участь не для меня".

languages.text: "Why, are you already planning to take it for yourself?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty is greater than me alone. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by the heirs and servants who indulge themselves in that miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."
languages.original_text: "А что, уже планируешь присвоить его себе?" {n}Верхняя губа Каллигоса подергивается в угрожающей полуулыбке.{/n} "Династия Винтерскейл — это не только я один. С делами протектората управятся наследники и слуги, лелеющие жизнь, полную убогих игрищ в политику. Эта тоскливая участь не для меня".

traits.locale_text: "Why, are you planning to take it for yourself already?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty goes beyond my person. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by heirs and servants who are indulging in a miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

"Why, are you planning to take it for yourself already?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty goes beyond my person. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by heirs and servants who are indulging in a miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

"Why, are you planning to take it for yourself already?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty goes beyond my person. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by their heirs and servants who are indulging in a miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

"Why, are you planning to take it for yourself already?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty goes beyond my person. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by their heirs and servants who are indulging in a miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

"Why, are you already planning to take it for yourself?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty is greater than me alone. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by the heirs and servants who indulge themselves in that miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

"Why, are you already planning to take it for yourself?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty is greater than me alone. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by the heirs and servants who indulge themselves in that miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

languages.text: «¿Qué pasa, ya me lo quieres quitar?». {n}Calligos forma una media sonrisa amenazadora.{/n} «La dinastía Winterscale no se limita a mi persona. Los asuntos del protectorado recaerán sobre los herederos y sirvientes que se dedican al miserable juego de la política. Es un destino banal que ya no me atrae en absoluto».
languages.original_text: "Why, are you already planning to take it for yourself?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty is greater than me alone. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by the heirs and servants who indulge themselves in that miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué pasa, ya me lo quieres quitar?». {n}Calligos forma una media sonrisa amenazadora.{/n} «La dinastía Winterscale no se limita a mi persona. Los asuntos del protectorado recaerán sobre los herederos y sirvientes que se dedican al miserable juego de la política. Es un destino banal que ya no me atrae en absoluto».

languages.text: « Pourquoi cette question ? Vous comptez déjà vous l'approprier ? {n}demande Calligos avec un demi-sourire menaçant.{/n} La dynastie Winterscale ne se limite pas à moi. Les affaires du protectorat seront gérées par des héritiers et des serviteurs qui se livrent à de misérables jeux politiques. Ce triste sort ne m'intéresse plus. »
languages.original_text: "Why, are you already planning to take it for yourself?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty is greater than me alone. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by the heirs and servants who indulge themselves in that miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi cette question ? Vous comptez déjà vous l'approprier ? {n}demande Calligos avec un demi-sourire menaçant.{/n} La dynastie Winterscale ne se limite pas à moi. Les affaires du protectorat seront gérées par des héritiers et des serviteurs qui se livrent à de misérables jeux politiques. Ce triste sort ne m'intéresse plus. »

languages.text: 「なんだ、すでに自分でやるつもりでいるのか？」{n}カリゴスの上唇が恐ろしげな半笑いで引きつる。{/n}「ウィンタースケール王朝は俺一人の存在よりはるかに偉大だ。保護領に関する仕事は、情けない政治ゲームにうつつを抜かす跡継ぎたちや下僕たちにやらせる。そんな退屈なこと、俺にはどうだっていいことさ」
languages.original_text: "Why, are you already planning to take it for yourself?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty is greater than me alone. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by the heirs and servants who indulge themselves in that miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

traits.locale_text: 「なんだ、すでに自分でやるつもりでいるのか？」{n}カリゴスの上唇が恐ろしげな半笑いで引きつる。{/n}「ウィンタースケール王朝は俺一人の存在よりはるかに偉大だ。保護領に関する仕事は、情けない政治ゲームにうつつを抜かす跡継ぎたちや下僕たちにやらせる。そんな退屈なこと、俺にはどうだっていいことさ」

languages.text: “怎么？你已经打算把它据为己有了吗？”{n}卡里戈斯抽动着上唇，露出了威胁的笑容。{/n}“温特斯凯尔王朝可不仅仅只有我一个人。王朝的事务由我的继承人和仆人来处理，就让那些人沉迷于这场无聊的政治游戏吧。如此沉闷的命运，我已经不感兴趣了。”
languages.original_text: "Why, are you already planning to take it for yourself?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty is greater than me alone. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by the heirs and servants who indulge themselves in that miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

traits.locale_text: “怎么？你已经打算把它据为己有了吗？”{n}卡里戈斯抽动着上唇，露出了威胁的笑容。{/n}“管理温特斯凯尔王朝的工作，已经超出了我的能力范围。王朝的事务由我的继承人和仆人来处理，就让那些人沉迷于这场无聊的政治游戏吧。如此沉闷的命运，我已经不感兴趣了。”

languages.text: "Habt Ihr denn etwa schon vor, es Euch einzuverleiben?" {n}Calligos' Oberlippe zuckt halb bedrohlich, halb lächelnd.{/n} "Die Winterzunder-Dynastie besteht nicht aus mir allein. Die Erben und Diener, die sich mit dem erbärmlichen Spiel der Politik abgeben, werden sich um die Angelegenheiten des Protektorats kümmern. Dieses trostlose Schicksal reizt mich nicht mehr."
languages.original_text: "Why, are you already planning to take it for yourself?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty is greater than me alone. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by the heirs and servants who indulge themselves in that miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr denn etwa schon vor, es Euch einzuverleiben?" {n}Calligos' Oberlippe zuckt halb bedrohlich, halb lächelnd.{/n} "Die Dynastie Winterzunder geht über meine Person hinaus. Die Erben und Diener werden sich um die Angelegenheiten des Protektorats kümmern und ein erbärmliches politisches Spiel treiben. Dieses trostlose Schicksal reizt mich nicht mehr."

languages.text: "Neden soruyorsun? Kendine mi almayı planlıyorsun?" {n}Calligos'un üst dudağı bükülüp çarpık ve tehditkâr bir gülümseme meydana getiriyor.{/n} "Winterscale hanedanlığı, şahsımdan çok daha büyüktür. Protektoranın meseleleri, kendilerini o sefil politik oyunlara kaptırmış vârislerce ve hizmetkârlarca halledilecek. Bu kasvetli kader artık ilgimi çekmiyor."
languages.original_text: "Why, are you already planning to take it for yourself?" {n}Calligos's upper lip twitches in a menacing half-smile.{/n} "The Winterscale dynasty is greater than me alone. The affairs of the protectorate will be handled by the heirs and servants who indulge themselves in that miserable game of politics. That dreary fate no longer appeals to me."
